scripts.start: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp manifest.json dist/elementary.config.json && parcel --no-cache --port 3000 --https --cert localhost-cert.pem --key localhost-key.pem index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build --no-source-maps --no-cache --public-url '.' index.html
scripts.export: npm run build && mkdir export && elem-export -m manifest.json -o export ./dist
